name: RAIL LIES
description:
CONTROLS: 

WASD - TO MOVE

SPACE - TO INTERACT

Remember! Whatever you choose - keep moving forward. The key to escaping the train loop lies ahead!

The story:

You suddenly wake up on a moving train. How did you end up here? You do not remember. 

You see a fairly pleasant old lady sitting before you. Perhaps she can tell you what is going on?

Made for Ludum Dare 47 by Dazrow (Youtube.com/dazrow), VaustXIII (twitch.tv/vaustxiii)

Special thanks to Covior_na_stene for providing arts and Raging_Mike for support with story, ideas and many more!
